flowContents.comments: This NiFi flow processes Salesforce account data by first splitting it into individual records, then transforming the data by renaming fields (Id → account_id, Name → account_name) and adding the +91 prefix to phone numbers. Each record is validated to ensure essential fields are present, and only valid records are inserted into Databricks
flowContents.name: SalesforceToDataBricks

properties.Custom SOQL Query:
SELECT Id, Name, Phone, Website, Industry
FROM Account
WHERE Owner.Username = 'divija.garg613@agentforce.com'
  AND DAY_ONLY(CreatedDate) = 2025-10-01
